Slight addon (I didn't realize that Vehement's attack had such a big 
range)

::Kluster::

Kluster feels Vehement's attack hitting him, his armor melting around 
his body, but the attack doing no serious damage otherwise.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Grimmler/Fliq/Kluster::
> 
> Grimmler taps several last commands on the shuttle controll board, 
> activating his comm. He presses one more button, and both him and 
> Fliq are edjected into the air, hundreds of feet from the CF.
> 
> "Maximals, DROP DOWN, NOW!!!" he yells into his comm on an encoded 
> frequency, hoping that the Maximals will heed his warning. A second 
> later, the shuttle, going over 400 miles per hour, clears the top 
of 
> the Cybertronian Fire, smashing into the ground two dozen feet 
behind 
> Vehement and his minions. The shuttle digs several feet into the 
> ground upon impact, the self destruct sequence that Grimmler had 
> activated not having any time to activate. But that wasn't 
> neccessary. Every fuel tank in the shuttle is smashed open, coming 
> into contact with energy and exploding in a huge inferno. Rocks, 
> dirt, and metal fly in all directions, the blast radius of the 
> explosion being about 30 feet.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster drops to the ground at Grimmler's warning, the shuttle 
> exploding behind Vehement seconds later. He feels shuttle pieces 
> flying over his head, smashing into the shields of the Cybertronian 
> Fire (IR or Tav, please post damage). Dirt and rocks shower over 
him, 
> but the metal plates are launched from the shuttle too fast to hit 
> anyone who is laying down. He opens his eyes, realizing it was 
> impossible to see through all the ash.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Grimmler smiles, watching the huge explosion. His jetpack 
propelling 
> him toward the Cybertronian Fire, he fires his rifle randomly at 
> where he last saw the enemies. Several shuttle pieces fly past him. 
> Grimmler dodges one and looking ahead. His eyes narrow as he sees 
> another plate heading for him, but there wasn't time to dodge. The 
> plate smashes into Grimmler, the impact instantly putting him into 
> stasis lock and launching him down toward the ground, his jetpack 
> exploding on his back.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Fliq lands safely on the ground, looking up to see Grimmler's 
jetpack 
> explode. He transforms into robot mode, running to catch the fellow 
> Maximal.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> > (First you say it's not in your chest, then it is.  Man, you're 
> crazy)
> > 
> > 
> > Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Vehement would've laughed at Iron Raptor's display of ignorance, 
> but Vehement 
> > wasn't in control of his own body.
> > 
> > "Foolish Maximal." an arm raised, but Unicron seemed to notice 
all 
> the 
> > Maximals, but a plan formed without a tiny bit of fear.
> > 
> > ---
> > 
> > Sun Crusher saw an object approaching, and raised his right 
wrist, 
> the barrel 
> > attached to the bottom of it, two missiles launching out at 
> Whistler's 
> > sternum as he jumped at him.
> > 
> > The Brotherhood member transformed to his hover tank mode.
> > ---
> > 
> > Reflector flew upward, the missiles missing but twenty of the 
> bullets 
> > striking his legs and the flames engulfing the back of them.
> > 
> > He didn't seem to notice the damaged armor of his legs, 
transformin 
> to his 
> > camera mode and hovering the air.  A bright flash emitted from 
the 
> camera, 
> > the flash designed to temporarily disable optic sensors, the 
flash 
> heading 
> > for the Maximals present.
> > 
> > ---
> > 
> > Vehement's face contorted into a smile, the robot doing a flip 
> backwards and 
> > transforming into the shape of a sword.  The sword hovered for 
the 
> briefest 
> > of seconds, not affected by the flash, same as Sun Crusher.  The 
> tip of the 
> > nine foot long broadsword began to glow a dark emerald.
> > 
> > A bolt lanced out form the tip of the blade, extending into a 
fifty 
> by fifty 
> > radius, the middle of the blast pointed at Iron Raptor.
> > 
> > Control returned to Vehement, who instantly felt more drained 
then 
> he ever 
> > had, scanners telling him he had lost 80% of all his power in 
that 
> single ye 
> > powerful blast.  He transformed back to robot mode, feeling but 
not 
> showing 
> > his weakness.
